statements: DELETE FROM fitness_performance_reports WHERE class_id = 456 AND feedback = 'Good job!';
DELETE FROM fitness_performance_reports WHERE instructor_id = 1 AND class_id = 101;
DELETE FROM fitness_performance_reports WHERE attendance > 20 OR feedback LIKE '%good%'

DELETE FROM Attendances WHERE student_id = 1001 AND class_id = 2001;
